title: FPS drop
body:
So I just got the game and I am having huge FPS drops every time I move the mouse, this happens with no other game and I have a very good computer
Computer specs below:
gtx 1070 gpu
16 gb ram
processor: AMD FX 6300 Six core

I have tried updating my drivers, messing with every setting I could think of, I even lowered the graphics all the way to low and still got the FPS drops whenever I moved the cursor. If I just let the cursor sit and dont move it at all the frames stay at whatever I set them to (be it 200 or 60) but as soon as I move the cursor they go all over the place, saw it drop as low as 7 at one point. I really have no idea how to fix this please help.

replies.body: I feel as if you tried a lot of the steps in our FPS guide already, so i'm gonna get you over to the [tech team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to take a closer look into the situation. Make sure to bring this information over to them as well, so that it speeds up the process.
